summary: Meet Eve and Bea in the Honningbrew Meadery - Standalone followers - 3 body options: UNP- skinny,  UNPetite and CBBE- slim
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Ver. 2.0 uploaded[/size]
[size=4]Changes:
New armors added
New Jewelry added
Some new tattoos added
Note: The armors and jewelry aren't playable. When you want to use it for your character download the original mods (links below).[/size]

[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/6tfc7mxtr/2014-07-07_19088705.jpg[/img]

Intro: Eve and Bea are sisters, half-bloods nord/woodelves and used to travel Skyrim with their father, a true no name nord warrior. Unfortunately he passed away not long ago near Whiterun due to an insidious skeever-attack. After they buried his ashes the sisters had to take the most intolerable decision of their young lives: to go and look for a job. But they were lucky, Sahbjorn quested help for his throughout crowded meadery.

Description: This mod adds two followers, Eve and Bea to Skyrim. They are standalone you need to install no other mod. They are base level 6 and level up with the player. As mentioned they can be found at the Honningbrew Meadery near Whiterun.
They are flagged as protected, so they can possibly die. Use a follower overhaul to make them essential when needed.

[size=4]4 body options:[/size]
1. Eve and Bea UNP skinny
2. Eve and Bea UNPetite
3. Eve UNP skinny and Bea UNPetite
4. Eve and Bea CBBE slim

Some body details:
[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/dldjxzmm7/elven02.jpg[/img]

Installation: NMM or unzip and copy/paste esp and bsa in your Skyrim Data folder.
Uninstallation: remove the two files.

Take a look at my other stuff:

1.0 Initial release
1.0.1 fixed small language issue
1.2 added UNPetite option and optional hairstyles
1.3 added Princess of the Woods armor (slightly modified by me) and UNP-Boots
1.5 added CBBE slim option
2.0 added new armors jewelry and tattoos
